# Add Your Photo Here

To display your photo in the portfolio:

1. Add your photo to this `client/public/` directory
2. Name it `delowar-photo.jpg` (or update the filename in `client/src/components/ProfilePhoto.tsx` line 77)
3. Recommended image specifications:
   - Format: JPG, PNG, or WebP
   - Dimensions: At least 400x400px (square ratio works best)
   - File size: Optimized for web (under 500KB recommended)

The photo will automatically be displayed with beautiful styling effects including:

- Animated gradient borders
- Hover effects
- Floating tech badges
- Decorative elements

If no photo is found, a placeholder with your name will be displayed.
